snippet: FISCHER--Arthur A.,92, died April 19. A lifelong New Yorker, Art was the son of Lillian and Sol, brother of Sylvia, David, Budd and Marjorie. Father of Harold, Sally, Geoffrey and son-in-law Elliott. Grandfather to Jack. He cherished his time at the University of North Carolina, in the Army and career in advertising, entertainment, travel and 50+ years with the Friars Club. 1/3
lead_paragraph: FISCHER--Arthur A.,92, died April 19. A lifelong New Yorker, Art was the son of Lillian and Sol, brother of Sylvia, David, Budd and Marjorie. Father of Harold, Sally, Geoffrey and son-in-law Elliott. Grandfather to Jack. He cherished his time at the University of North Carolina, in the Army and career in advertising, entertainment, travel and 50+ years with the Friars Club. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FISCHER, ARTHUR A.
